author: Simon Difford
description: Spirit-forward, dry and subtly aromatic. Made more accessable with either bourbon in place of rye and/or ruby port in place of tawny port.
name: Falconi
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
